title: Chocolate, courgette and walnut loaf cake
ingredients: ['400g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 big pinch cinnamon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '250g grated courgette', '200g caster sugar', '240ml vegetable oil', '4 eggs', '100g plain cooking chocolate, chopped', '1 handful chopped walnuts']
